channel.title: Posts on Kenywil Tiu Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: I’m Kenywil Tiu, an aspiring blockchain developer with interest in learning innovative technologies. The intention of this blog is to share what I’ve been learning, and will be learning. This will also act as a journal for proof of concept mini projects, or full blown projects that I will be developing. Â As of now I have professional experience being a DevOps Engineer for 5 years. I also have a good understanding, and have programmed simple applications using programming languages such as Javascript, and Python.
